page.title: 17FAMILY LIFE
page.content: A family in Kirkmichael with 2 sons, one 10 year old and one 1 year old, enjoys a Sunday together as one parent usually works on the other six days of the week. A typical Sunday for this family starts by getting up at 9a.m. and having a leisurely breakfast. One parent and the elder son go to the village church and afterwards the whole family often goes to a hotel in Maidens for a bar lunch. In the afternoon father and elder son visit Maybole swimming baths. After an evening meal about 6p.m. the family watches television until bedtime.
